page.title: 05MUTHILL SURVEY, EMPLOYMENT.
page.content: Each pupil in Primary 4-7 took home 5 questionnaires. We asked relatives and friends to complete them.{105}were distributed and{95}replies received. {25}were from people under 20, 55 from people between{20}and{60}and{15}from over 60's. { Employment}(main categories) {22}were at school,{21}housewives,{10} employed in agriculture (including {4} farmers){7}shop or petrol pump assistants,{6}in office-based jobs,{4} in small factories in Crieff,{6} domestic workers. Jobs done by only one person include airline pilot, road worker, stone mason, security officer, joiner, teacher and one boy on a youth training scheme. Of those going from home to school or work,{20}travel less than one mile{27} between one and five miles and{11} travel more than fives miles.
